data.name: ERRMSG_TABSTOPLEFT_VALUE_DETAIL
data.value: The TabStopJustLeft new property value must be a valid TabIndex (greater than zero).
data.comment: Message value of ArgumentOutOfRange exception thrown by TabStopJustLeft property setter on TabStopIndex

data.name: ERRMSG_TABSTOPLEFT_VALUE_NAME
data.comment: ParamName value of ArgumentOutOfRange exception thrown by TabStopJustLeft property setter on TabStopIndex

data.name: FRMLBL_ENC_CBO_ASCII
data.comment: Text for encoding item in list box for ASCII encoding

data.name: FRMLBL_ENC_CBO_UNICODE
data.comment: Text for encoding item in list box for Unicode encoding

data.name: FRMLBL_ENC_CBO_UTF_32
data.comment: Text for encoding item in list box for UTF-32 encoding

data.name: FRMLBL_ENC_CBO_UTF_7
data.comment: Text for encoding item in list box for UTF-7 encoding

data.name: FRMLBL_ENC_CBO_UTF_8
data.comment: Text for encoding item in list box for UTF-8 encoding

data.name: FRMLBL_PRD_CMDBROWSEFORDIRECTORY
data.comment: Label for cmdBrowseForDirectory button on Form1

data.name: FRMLBL_PRD_LBLWORKINGDIRECTORY
data.comment: Label for lblWorkingDirectory column in ProfileDirectory

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_CMDNEWPROFILE
data.comment: Label for cmdNewProfile button on Form1

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_CMDPROFILEFILEBROWSER
data.comment: Label for cmdProfileFileBrowser button on Form1

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_CMDSAVEPROFILE
data.comment: Label for cmdSaveProfile button on Form1

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_ERRMSG_INVALID_GUID_FORMAT
data.value: The GUID generated by the SaveProfile routine has an unexpected length of {0} bytes. The expected length is 16 bytes.
data.comment: Message generated by the SaveProfile routine gets an unexpected byte count for its marker GUID.

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_ERRMSG_INVALID_INT32_FORMAT
data.value: The supplied INT32 entity converted to an unexpected number of bytes; expected 4, got {0}.
data.comment: Message generated by the SaveProfile routine gets an unexpected byte count for one of its Int32 conversions.

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_ERRMSG_MUST_BE_GUID_STRING
data.value: The first column in any row must be a well formed GUID string. The value that is in error is {1}{0}{1}.
data.comment: Message generated by the SaveProfile routine gets an invalid GUID string.

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_ERRMSG_NO_PROPERTIES
data.value: At least one property must be specified. There are none in row {0} with a GUID of {1}.
data.comment: Message generated by the SaveProfile routine gets a row that contains no properties.

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_HIDECOLUMTOKEN_1_OF_2
data.comment: First of 2 tokens that signal intention to hide a column

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_HIDECOLUMTOKEN_2_OF_2
data.comment: Second of 2 tokens that signal intention to hide a column

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_LBLFILENAME
data.comment: Label for txtFileName text box NamedProfile

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_LBLPROFILENAME
data.comment: Label for lblProfileName column in NamedProfile

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_METADATA_SAVE_FAILED
data.comment: Message displayed when the profile metadata save failed.

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_MSG_DIRECTORY_CREATED
data.value: The specified working directory was created.
data.comment: Message displayed in prompt window when a new working directory is created.

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_MSG_DIRECTORY_FOUND
data.comment: Message displayed in prompt window when the specified working directory exists.

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_MSG_DIRECTORY_NOT_CREATED
data.value: $$WorkingDirectoryName$$ was specified, but hasn't been created. Create it or select a different directory.
data.comment: Message displayed in prompt window when the user declines to allow the directory to be created.

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_MSG_DIRECTORY_NOT_FOUND
data.value: {0} does not exist.{1}{1}Do you want to create it?
data.comment: Message displayed on message box when the specified directory cannot be found

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_MSG_PROFILE_EXISTS
data.value: The specified profile exists, and it has a file in the specified working directory, which will be overwritten if the profile is saved.
data.comment: Message displayed when the name is changed to that of a profile for which a file exists in the working directory.

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_MSG_PROFILE_IS_BRAND_NEW
data.value: The specified profile is new, and no file exists in the specified working directory.
data.comment: Message displayed when the profile name is changed to that of a brand new profile.

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_MSG_PROFILE_SAVED
data.value: Profile saved. {0} bytes written to disk.
data.comment: Message displayed following a successful save.

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_MSG_PROFILE_SAVE_FAILED
data.comment: Message displayed following a save failure.

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_MSG_PROFILE_SAVE_PROMPT
data.comment: Message displayed when closing with unsaved work

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_PROFILEFILENAMESUFFIX
data.comment: Suffix (extension) to append to profile name to create file

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_TXTPROFILEFILENAME
data.comment: Initial value for txtFileName text box on Form1

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_TXTPROFILENAME
data.comment: Default value for txtProfileName column in NamedProfile

data.name: FRMLBL_PRF_TXTPROFILEUNSPECIFIEDCWD
data.comment: Message indicating that the working directory is unspecified.
